Segment.name: RU1
Segment.comment: To communicate information (from the United States Railroad Retirement Board to the employing carrier) pertinent to the processing of retirement claims

Field.name: RailRetirementActivityCode
Field.comment: Code used to identify the activity being conveyed

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: EmploymentCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of last employer

Field.name: UnemployedReasonCode
Field.comment: Code indicating reason reported by claimant for not now working

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ClaimProfile
Field.comment: A series of code entries which identify the claimed status of an employee for each day in the 14-day claim cycle for unemployment or sickness benefits
